name: StratosFear [V1.1]
description:
Vertical shoot 'em up originally developed for Brackey's Game Jam in August 2022. Make it to the end of the battlefield (and blow up as many enemies as possible) to win.

The main menu theme is also available as a free download at Ghost Collision's Bandcamp page.

V1.1 Update:

- Changed screen orientation

- Added more powerups

- Added lives & respawn system

- Adjusted enemy and player stats

- Various 'quality of life' improvements

Created by Adam Prochazka & Pratham Patel. Full credits available in-game.
